item.title: Quest Help (the ingame quest helping)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

This will tell you your case number.

			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ddragonimp")){
			println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
			}

before this

			if (!antiHax())
				break;
				resetAction();
				server.clickingMost.clicking(playerId);
				break;

Type in your user name not mine plz.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Help (the ingame quest helping)
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“lord killord, post:1, topic:332780”]Ok I’ve made this quest, I’ve added it in … but for some reason the quest help won’t open up … I’m pretty sure I’m missing a piece of code somewhere - anywayz this is what I’ve added in so far

Into the client.java =>

public void q12help() { sendQuest("Land of the Pumpkins", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q12 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to the King.", 8147); sendQuest("His land can be found by a portal at home.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

and this in the clickingmost.java …

case 28175: c.q12help(); break;

does anyone know what else I need to add? thx[/quote]

Well, lets see here…

I can tell your using a Delta_ base.

What you need to do is add more to the QuestHelp

Like stages and stuff, you also need to add the saving and loading methods for q12.

Making a quest is hard work, so I would start out a little lower than just jumping into a quest right away.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Help (the ingame quest helping)
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

Ok I’ve made this quest, I’ve added it in … but for some reason the quest help won’t open up … I’m pretty sure I’m missing a piece of code somewhere - anywayz this is what I’ve added in so far

Into the client.java =>

public void q12help() { sendQuest("Land of the Pumpkins", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q12 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to the King.", 8147); sendQuest("His land can be found by a portal at home.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

and this in the clickingmost.java …

case 28175: c.q12help(); break;

does anyone know what else I need to add? thx

Read full topic
